text: Mitchell Craig "Mitch" Pileggi (born April 5, 1952) is an American actor. He was born in Portland, Oregon. Pileggi is best known for his role as Walter Skinner on The X-Files. He had a recurring role on Stargate Atlantis as Colonel Steven Caldwell. He appeared in the 2008 movie Flash of Genius. In 2008, he began a recurring role as Ernest Darby in Sons of Anarchy.
